issue.title: [Rust] Implement FromIter for timestamps, that includes timezone info
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11312](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11312). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently have TimestampArray::from_vec and TimestampArray::from_opt_vec in order to provide timezone information. We do not have an option that uses FromIter.

When implementing this, we should search the codebase (esp Parquet) and replace the vector-based methods above with iterators where it makes sense.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11312?focusedCommentId=17332197) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/168
